CustomField.description: The API Name of the Salesforce object that is the source of the badge information. For example, a badge on a contact record displaying open cases would have a Source Object of 'Case'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API Name of the Salesforce object that is the source of the badge information. For example, a badge on a contact record displaying open cases would have a Source Object of 'Case'.
CustomField.label: Source Object
